description: This file defines FastAPI route handlers for CRUD operations and filtering of recipes, as well as rating functionality, with dependencies on SQLAlchemy ORM models and schemas, and includes filtering logic for recipe metadata.
external_methods: Recipe: filter, order_by, offset, limit, add, commit, refresh, delete

methods.name: _apply_filters( query, search: Optional[str], tags: Optional[List[str]], cuisine: Optional[str], difficulty: Optional[str], min_time: Optional[int], max_time: Optional[int], )
methods.description: Applies optional filtering parameters to a SQLAlchemy query for recipes based on search, tags, cuisine, difficulty, and time constraints.

methods.name: create_recipe( recipe: RecipeCreate, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_active_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
delete_recipe( recipe_id: int, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_active_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )

list_recipes( search: Optional[str] = None, tags: Optional[List[str]] = Query(default=None), cuisine: Optional[str] = None, difficulty: Optional[str] = None, min_time: Optional[int] = None, max_time: Optional[int] = None, sort: Optional[str] = "newest", page: Optional[int] = 1, page_size: Optional[int] = 20, db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
rate_recipe( recipe_id: int, rating: RatingCreate, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_active_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
update_recipe( recipe_id: int, data: RecipeUpdate, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_active_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )

ctags.name: _apply_filters
ctags.signature: ( query, search: Optional[str], tags: Optional[List[str]], cuisine: Optional[str], difficulty: Optional[str], min_time: Optional[int], max_time: Optional[int], )

ctags.name: create_recipe

ctags.name: delete_recipe

ctags.name: rate_recipe
ctags.signature: ( recipe_id: int, rating: RatingCreate, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_active_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
